transcript.text: When we work with company information every day, it can be easy to forget that much of it is confidential.

contentBackground.img: A group of employees in a company office building.

panelText.text:
We need to protect any information that:
  • has commercial value, and
  • is not published or publicly known, and
  • the owner (whether Johnson Controls or another person or company) has taken steps to keep confidential

This might sound simple. But when you work with information every day, and certain topics are common knowledge among colleagues, it can be easy to forget that they are not common knowledge in the outside world.
